bibl.title: Alexander the Great as a Kausia Diadematophoros from Egypt.
bibl.note: Private American collection. Royal head sculpted in limestone, H. 23 cm. Egypt (Faiyum), late 4th to early 3rd century B.C.

bibl.title: The Intellectual Heritage of Egypt. Studies Presented to László Kákosy by Friends and Colleagues on the Occasion of His 60th Birthday

bibl.seg: BIANCHI Robert S., Alexander the Great as a Kausia Diadematophoros from Egypt.

Ulrich LUFT (Ed.), The Intellectual Heritage of Egypt. Studies Presented to László Kákosy by Friends and Colleagues on the Occasion of His 60th Birthday = Studia Aegyptiaca. 14 (Budapest, 1992) pp. 69-75 et pll. 2-3.
Private American collection. Royal head sculpted in limestone, H. 23 cm. Egypt (Faiyum), late 4th to early 3rd century B.C.
